meanings.sent1: The gardener carefully dug up the wurzels to inspect their health.

meanings.definition: A British folk band known for their humorous songs.

meanings.sent2: Fans of the wurzels eagerly awaited the release of their latest album.

meanings.sent4: Listening to the wurzels' music always brings a smile to my face.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a person from the West Country of England.
meanings.sent1: The locals affectionately referred to him as a wurzels, proud of his roots in the countryside.
meanings.sent2: Growing up in the small village, she was known as a true wurzels.
